name: Chicken Slaughter
description:
Chicken Slaughter is a free arcade/action game, which is about fun and chickens. So let's make some feathers fly!

You have just entered a feared place, where chaos and madness hide behind a nice wooden fence... the way is shot, the enemy is here. CHICKENS WANT TO KILL YOU!

SURVIVE IN THE ARENA
Defend yourself against your worst ennemies: the ferocious chickens. Be careful, the black are the nastiest ones.

FIGHT AND SURVIVE
Take your sword and shield. Smash all those vile creatures before they peck your eyes and head in this crazy battle (and eventually kill you).

COLLECT A MAXIMUM OF THIGHS
The more you smash, the more you score! The keys to success: quickness and precision.

Will you chicken out or become the ultimate Chicken Farm Exterminator?

FEATURES:
- Intense quick action
- Easy gameplay
- Unlockable characters
- Lots of chickens
- One of the most silly game in the store.

No chickens were harmed in the making of this game.


Facebook: facebook.com/ZeroGamesStudios
